TopicTitle: Ksp Inventory mod mod acting up

Articles.Content: In the kerbal inventory/extraplanetary bases mod the "bbq survey stake" Isn't going into my kerbals inventory. If there's a way to fix it please tell me.
Also the extraplanetary bases "K&K Launchpad" Isn't able to be built on but the one in a different mod is. I'm thinking the issue is only in the extraplanetary bases mod.
